title: Textile, 18th century
medium:
Medium: wool
Technique: warp-faced plain weave; complementary warps in plain weave with inner wefts; sides and ends cut
description: Plain rep. stripes of cotton alternating with double-faced warp pattern stripes with figures and animals. Single wool warps (2-ply, S-spun). Dull pink, black, blue, cream.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 18th century.
18th century. Medium: wool
Technique: warp-faced plain weave; complementary warps in plain weave with inner wefts; sides and ends cut. Gift of John Pierpont Morgan. 1902-1-784.
